languages.text: "И это тоже правда. Сколь мерзки мы в своих грехах, столь же убоги в своем стремлении убежать от осознания своей гнусной природы".
"So it is. We are as contemptible in our faults as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."
languages.original_text: "И это тоже правда. Сколь мерзки мы в своих грехах, столь же убоги в своем стремлении убежать от осознания своей гнусной природы".

traits.locale_text: "So it is. We are as contemptible in our sins as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."
"So it is. We are as contemptible in our sins as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."
"So it is. We are as contemptible in our sins as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."
"So it is. We are as contemptible in our sins as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."
"So it is. We are as contemptible in our faults as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."

languages.text: “确实如此。深陷罪孽的我们都是可鄙的，因为我们如此可悲地想要逃避，不愿看清我们卑劣的本性。”
languages.original_text: "So it is. We are as contemptible in our faults as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。深陷罪孽的我们都是可鄙的，因为我们如此可悲地想要逃避，不愿看清我们卑劣的本性。”

languages.text: «Estoy de acuerdo. Nuestras faltas nos convierten en seres despreciables y nuestro deseo por escapar del entendimiento de nuestra propia naturaleza vulgar nos convierte en seres patéticos».
languages.original_text: "So it is. We are as contemptible in our faults as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy de acuerdo. Nuestros pecados nos convierten en seres despreciables y nuestro deseo por escapar del entendimiento de nuestra propia naturaleza vulgar nos convierte en seres patéticos».

languages.text: 「そういうものでしょう。我々は軽蔑に値する過ちを犯しながらも、自らの卑しい本性から目をそらそうとする哀れな存在です」
languages.original_text: "So it is. We are as contemptible in our faults as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."

traits.locale_text: 「そういうものでしょう。我々は軽蔑に値する罪を犯しながらも、自らの卑しい本性から目をそらそうとする哀れな存在です」

languages.text: "In der Tat. Wir sind in unseren Verfehlungen ebenso armselig wie in unserem Bestreben, vor der Erkenntnis unserer ureigenen Natur davonzulaufen."
languages.original_text: "So it is. We are as contemptible in our faults as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Wir sind in unseren Sünden ebenso verabscheuungswürdig wie unser Bestreben, vor der Erkenntnis unserer ureigenen Natur davonzulaufen, erbärmlich ist."

languages.text: « Absolument. Nous sommes tout aussi méprisables dans nos errements que pitoyables dans notre désir de fermer les yeux sur notre nature innée. »
languages.original_text: "So it is. We are as contemptible in our faults as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."

traits.locale_text: « Absolument. Nous sommes tout aussi méprisables dans nos péchés que pitoyables dans notre désir de fermer les yeux sur notre nature innée. »

languages.text: "Evet, öyle. Ne kadar adi birer günahkârsak kendi doğamızın farkına varmaktan kaçınma arzumuzda da bir o kadar zavallıyız."
languages.original_text: "So it is. We are as contemptible in our faults as we are pathetic in our desire to run from the realisation of our own base nature."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, öyle. Ne kadar adi birer günahkârsak, kendi doğamızın farkına varmaktan kaçınma arzumuzda da bir o kadar zavallıyız."
